body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello, I'm Billy Bryant from Speedy Car Dealership. May I please have your name?

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Nice to meet you, Alexis. Could you please provide me with your phone number and address for our records?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Sure, my phone number is five five five, one two three, four five six seven, and my address is two zero one, Elm Street.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for sharing that information, Alexis. It will help us serve you better. Can you also provide me with your email address please?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Of course, my email address is alexisfoster@example.com.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Great, I have noted down all the details. Thank you, Alexis, for your time and cooperation. Is there anything else you'd like to discuss today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: No, that's all for now. Thank you.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: You're welcome, Alexis. If you need any further assistance, feel free to reach out. Have a great day!
